Headline: #71 71st/South Shore Temporary Reroute at Commercial/87th
ShortDescription: 71 71st/South Shore buses are temporarily rerouted via: Commercial, 87th, Burley, 83rd, and South Shore, due to, street blockage, near Commercial/87th.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#71 71st/South Shore buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions via: Commercial, 87th, Burley, 83rd, and South Shore, due to, street blockage, near Commercial/87th.

Allow extra travel time.
